name: Cargair
about: Cargair Flight Academy, founded in 1961, is a renowned institution in the Quebec aviation industry, offering comprehensive flight training programs. As part of the Prudâ€™homme Family's Cargair Ltd, the academy operates within a dynamic commercial air transport environment, closely tied to its subsidiary, Max Aviation. With nearly 60 years of experience, Cargair provides training from Private Pilot Licences (PPL) to Commercial Pilot Licences (CPL) and airline pilot training, including 50 hours with multi-engine aircraft. Supported by a fleet of 60 aircraft and in-house maintenance technicians, Cargair ensures consistent and high-quality training. Known as the largest private flight academy in Canada, Cargair is committed to guiding students through their aviation careers with a strong emphasis on practical experience and academic excellence.
